title: Armory Season Pass
description: The first armory season pass for Killing Floor 2, provides an all-access pass to the full collection of available weapons DLC including all upcoming 2021 weapons to be released throughout the year.
longDescription:
The first armory season pass for Killing Floor 2, provides an all-access pass to the full collection of available weapons DLC including all upcoming 2021 weapons to be released throughout the year.  Offers a bulk discount compared to buying them individually.

Day One purchase of the pass includes 11 weapon bundles :
- Ion Thruster Weapon Bundle,
- Rhino Revolver Weapon Bundle,
- Mosin Nagant Weapon Bundle,
- Riot Shield & Glock 18 Weapon Bundle, 
- Compound Bow Weapon Bundle, 
- Blunderbuss Weapon Bundle,
- Single & Dual Glock 18c Weapon Bundle,
- Minigun Weapon Bundle,
- Mine Reconstructor Weapon Bundle,
- Frost Fang Weapon Bundle,
- and the brand new Gravity Imploder Weapon Bundle released with the Spring 2021 Update!

The Killing Floor 2 Armory Season Pass also include access to the next 5 
Weapon Bundles scheduled as follows:
- 2 Weapons for Summer 2021
- 2 Weapons for Fall 2021
- 1 Weapon for WInter 2021

Each weapon bundle comes with 5 unique skin variants. Expand your repertoire of Zed descrution today!
